file.name: open-api.yml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  "/v1/fuels":
    get:
      operationId: getFuelPrices
      parameters:
        - name: date
          required: false
          in: query
          description:
            Price effective date. This parameter allows a search through
            the effective price date.
          example: "2021-01-01"
          schema:
            format: YYYY-MM-DD
            type: string
        - name: since
          required: false
          in: query
          description:
            Since price effective date. This parameter allows a search through
            the effective price date.
          example: "2021-01-01"
          schema:
            format: YYYY-MM-DD
            type: string
        - name: until
          required: false
          in: query
          description:
            Until price effective date. This parameter allows a search through
            the effective price date.
          example: "2021-02-02"
          schema:
            format: YYYY-MM-DD
            type: string
        - name: code
          required: false
          in: query
          description: Fuel code. This parameter allows a search through the fuel code
          example: PGACU00
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ResponseFuelPriceDto"
        "400":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/BadRequestResponseDto"
      tags:
        - Fuel Prices
info:
  title: Dominican Fuels prices API
  description: This API expose the dominican fuel prices from 2010 to date.
  version: v1
  contact:
    name: OGTIC
    url: https://ogtic.gob.do
    email: info@ogtic.gob.do
tags: []
servers: []
components:
  schemas:
    FuelPriceMetaDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        source:
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        week:
          type: number
        year:
          type: number
      required:
        - source
        - updatedAt
        - week
        - year
    PriceDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
        name:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        currency:
          type: number
        price:
          type: number
        date:
          format: date-time
          type: string
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - code
        - currency
        - price
        - date
    ResponseFuelPriceDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        valid:
          type: boolean
        meta:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/FuelPriceMetaDto"
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/PriceDto"
            maxLength: 1104
            minLength: 23
      required:
        - valid
        - meta
        - data
    Data:
      type: object
      properties:
        statusCode:
          type: number
          default: 400
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          format: date-time
          type: string
      required:
        - statusCode
        - message
        - timestamp
    BadRequestResponseDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        valid:
          type: boolean
          default: false
        data:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Data"
      required:
        - valid
        - data
